#summary Vcl.Styles.WebBrowser.

The Vcl.Styles.!WebBrowser unit includes a VCL Style hook to enable the VCL Styles in the TWebBrowser component, more info can be found in this article http://theroadtodelphi.wordpress.com/2012/03/20/delphi-vcl-styles-and-twebbrowser-source-code-released/
